verses.name: 2 Samuel 6:7
verses.text: And the anger of the Lord was kindled against Uzzah; and God smote him there for his error; and there he died by the ark of God.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 6:8
verses.text: And David was displeased, because the Lord had made a breach upon Uzzah: and he called the name of the place Perez–uzzah to this day.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 6:9
verses.text: And David was afraid of the Lord that day, and said, How shall the ark of the Lord come to me?
